body.p:
Newcastle: Decr 19. 1862
Friend J. L. Scott

At the last Sepr Term a fine was assessed agt John P. Beale of Carrol County for $50. for carrying Concealed Weapons -- It is said that Beale is a very good citizen, that he did not carry concealed weapons -- that a man by the name of Beckam shot at him & that Beale in Self defence provided himself with a pistol & walked up & down with it only for a half hour & no longer that he then gave it to his overseer -- This is all of it -- Beale intended to show these facts at Court but two of his children died at Court & prevented him from attending a Jugt was given by default -- He has other important evidence since Judgt -- Now it is as hard case on Beale -- He has gotten up a petition to the Governor which I send to you -- do for Mercy's sake & Justice too. Have this fine remitted
